thread.title: A touch of "luxe à la française"
thread.title_full: A touch of "luxe à la française" - Review of La Clef Tour Eiffel Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: AlexHuart
title: A touch of "luxe à la française"
text: A smile, a warm welcome, spacious rooms (for Paris), excellent quality of the products (bed, sofa, towels, generous water and juices in the room, Nespresso, quality of the bathroom produtcs etc). So you're getting what you are paying for. Calm for sure, a french touch in the decoration (not that hospital "scandinavian" style ), comfy. Compared to US standard, breakfast is not up to expectation for the price. Location is just perfect. I was travelling for business and I could enjoy the lobby for meeting business partners in a calm and luxurious environment with free coffee for everyone.
